title: Dan Greenawalt (Forza)
description:
This week we welcome back Dan Greenawalt of Turn10 Studios to cap off the Forza 5 coverage.  Just a couple of days prior to the XBox One launch Dan walks us through the final build of the game as we take turns playing during the podcast.  

Topics Covered

  • Dev Crunch
  • Collaboration with Top Gear
  • Hiring a creative team
  • The overall creative process when developing Forza
  • The XBox One launc
  • Breaking Aston Martins
  • Crazy race built GMC Syclones
  • Dan's M3
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
